title: Russian rooster
brief_description: The wild chase of hunters after a rooster becomes even more frenzied with background music of Rimsky - Korsakoffs “La Coq D’or”. The combination of music and animated figures drawn directly on the film creates an exciting visual experience. And don’t be so sure about who wins the chase.
